0:
This channel is for people who hate the typical 'motivational' videos on YT.

I don't want to see a montage of people lifting with Metallica and Disturbed in the background (although I love Heavy Metal), because it feels cheap and surface level.

Try to be INSPIRED rather than 'motivated'
Try to be DRIVEN instead of 'Luke-warm passionate'
&
Try to be DETERMINED instead of 'working on that grind'
